Uses of Class
org.jboss.aerogear.unifiedpush.message.UnifiedMessage.Builder

  • Packages that use UnifiedMessage.Builder 
    Package Description
    org.jboss.aerogear.unifiedpush.message  

    • Uses of UnifiedMessage.Builder in org.jboss.aerogear.unifiedpush.message

      Methods in org.jboss.aerogear.unifiedpush.message that return UnifiedMessage.Builder 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      UnifiedMessage.Builder UnifiedMessage.Builder.actionCategory(String actionCategory)
      An iOS specific argument to pass an Action Category for interaction notifications ( iOS8)
      UnifiedMessage.Builder UnifiedMessage.Builder.alert(String message)
      Triggers a dialog, displaying the value.
      UnifiedMessage.Builder UnifiedMessage.Builder.aliases(List<String> aliases)
      Sets a list of "identifiers", like username or email address.
      UnifiedMessage.Builder UnifiedMessage.Builder.attribute(String key, String value)
      Adds an application specific value for the given key.
      UnifiedMessage.Builder UnifiedMessage.Builder.attributes(Map<String,Object> attributes)
      A map containing various key-value pairs, that represent application specific values.
      UnifiedMessage.Builder UnifiedMessage.Builder.badge(String badge)
      Sets the value of the badge icon - no iOS API needs to be invoked by the app developer.
      UnifiedMessage.Builder UnifiedMessage.Builder.categories(Set<String> categories)
      A list of categories.
      UnifiedMessage.Builder UnifiedMessage.Builder.categories(String... categories)
      A list of categories.
      UnifiedMessage.Builder UnifiedMessage.Builder.contentAvailable()
      An iOS specific argument to mark the payload as 'content-available'.
      UnifiedMessage.Builder UnifiedMessage.Builder.deviceType(List<String> deviceType)
      A filter for notifying only users running a certain device.
      UnifiedMessage.Builder UnifiedMessage.Builder.masterSecret(String masterSecret)
      Set the masterSecret used to authenticate against the Push Server.
      UnifiedMessage.Builder UnifiedMessage.Builder.pushApplicationId(String pushApplicationId)
      Specifies which Push Application the message is for.
      UnifiedMessage.Builder UnifiedMessage.Builder.simplePush(String version)
      Needed when sending a message to a SimplePush Network
      UnifiedMessage.Builder UnifiedMessage.Builder.sound(String sound)
      Plays a given sound - On iOS no API needs to be invoked to play the sound file.
      UnifiedMessage.Builder UnifiedMessage.Builder.timeToLive(int seconds)
      Specify the Time To Live of the message, used by the APNs/GCM Push Networks.
      UnifiedMessage.Builder UnifiedMessage.Builder.variants(List<String> variants)
      A filter for notifying only specific mobile variants of the Push Application.
